Class Player

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      ScrollActor
          Body
              Player

public class Player
extends Body

This class is used to manage the behavior of the player in Space jump, the controls, the animations showed while the player acts and other parameters needed for the player

Version:
2016
Author:
Alfredo Granja && Gerardo Enriquez
